channel.title: Stats on Dan Goldin
channel.description: Recent content in Stats on Dan Goldin

item.title: 2015 Stats: Part 1
item.description: Over the past year I’ve been collecting personal stats nearly every day in order to see if I can spot any patterns and just understand myself better. These ranged from the time I spent sleeping to my mood (both physical and mental) to what I ate and drank. Over the weekend I hope to dive deeper into them and work out some relationships and patterns but for now I wanted to share just some basic summary stats. The script to analyze the data is up on GitHub but note that it’s designed for my file format.
